trans-unit.source: Using <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> requires a set of configuration operations on both the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server and agent:

seg-source.mrk: Using <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> requires a set of configuration operations on both the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server and agent:

target.mrk: Utiliser la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> nécessite d'effectuer un ensemble d'opérations de configuration sur le serveur et l'agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: Activate Web Restore on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server.

seg-source.mrk: Activate Web Restore on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server.

target.mrk: Activer la restauration Web sur le Serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Create a restore token to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in administrator and multi-agent mode.

seg-source.mrk: Create a restore token to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in administrator and multi-agent mode.

target.mrk: Créer un mot de passe pour utiliser la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode admin et multi-agent.

trans-unit.source: Enable <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />for the strategy. Only agents associated with such strategies will be allowed to use the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Only agents associated with such strategies will be allowed to use the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Activer la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans la stratégie.
Seuls les agents associés à de telles stratégies seront autorisés à utiliser la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Provide an e-mail address to identify the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to use <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in end-user mode.
